name: Flippy Bird
description:
Play this super addictive Flappy Bird-like game in FigJam. Starring Flippy - the unofficial Figma mascot!


Challenge your friends and see who can reach the top of the leaderboard!


Click the Flap button or press Space to flap Flippy's wings and fly through as many pipes as possible without crashing.


If you prefer to play without sound effects, click the speaker icon in the bottom right corner to mute the widget.
